solution_line_template: If Bom has {bom_seeds} seeds, then Gwi has {bom_seeds}+{gwi_more_than_bom} = <<{bom_seeds}+{gwi_more_than_bom}={gwi_seeds}>>{gwi_seeds} watermelon seeds.
Together, Bom and Gwi have {gwi_seeds}+{bom_seeds} = <<{gwi_seeds}+{bom_seeds}={bom_gwi_total_seeds}>>{bom_gwi_total_seeds} melon seeds.

Yeon's number of watermelon seeds is three times as many as the number that Gwi has, meaning Yeon has {yeon_multiplier}*{gwi_seeds} = <<{yeon_multiplier}*{gwi_seeds}={yeon_seeds}>>{yeon_seeds} watermelon seeds.
Together, the three friends have {yeon_seeds}+{bom_gwi_total_seeds} = <<{yeon_seeds}+{bom_gwi_total_seeds}={total_seeds}>>{total_seeds} watermelon seeds.
